synopsis.text: Raul Chaser, a small-town boy with big dreams of becoming a Hero, finds himself working as a store clerk at Magic Shop Leon in the Royal Capital. When his younger sister, Miuri, decides to pay him a surprise visit during her summer vacation, Raul and his colleagues concoct an elaborate scheme to maintain the illusion that he has indeed become the Hero he always aspired to be. Little does Miuri know that her brother's life has taken a completely different turn, and the daughter of the defeated Demon King, Fino Bloodstone, is now part of Raul's unexpected adventure in this unassuming electronics store. As the plan unfolds, the group discovers that keeping up appearances might be more challenging than they initially thought. Join Raul and his friends as they navigate through this hilarious and heartwarming tale of ambition, deception, and the unbreakable bond between siblings.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
